attributes.action: Council pay people to pick up litter
attributes.additional_details: I want the parliament to do it so the world can become a better place and global warming stops.
attributes.background: Pay people in society to pick up litter 50p per piece of litter

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local rubbish collection are a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
